name: XWUI Time Picker Component
description: Time selection component supporting 12-hour and 24-hour formats. Allows selection of hours, minutes, and optional seconds. Useful for time input in forms and scheduling interfaces.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the time picker

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected time value (string in HH:mm or HH:mm:ss format, or object with hour/minute/second properties)
